title: literally everytime i get my hands on graves jungle i lose
body:
every single time i play this guy my team suicides late game and we lose.

EVERY single time.

i already tell them to play safe but it doesnt matter when a plat 2 ori walks in 4 peopple we have vision on only to suicide then when i ask "what the fuck are you doing" , "we lost because of toxicity"

fuck that shit.

fuck that shit to hell and back.

that champion is fucking cursed.

the second i pick him hitler possesses one of my teammates and causes them to fucking suicide every second and become unable to control their impulses.

replies.body: i got this when i play darius. i was 1-10 at one point this season. now i'm 10-14 xD. Graves i auto win everywhere below diamond 4. I litterally have an account with 55wins 5 loses on graves and ppl call me  ascripter everygame i play there

same thing as yasuo

the champion is so brain dead easy and busted that they think they can 1 v 3 just because they demolish you in a 1 v 1
Thats how i feel everytime someone chooses vayne/udyr.
Think this should be in general discussion or miscellaneous for venting.
